items.name: Chicken (raw)
items.notes: Refrigerate promptly; discard if left above 40°F for >2 hours.

items.name: Ground beef
items.notes: High spoilage risk; keep cold and cook to 160°F.

items.name: Leafy greens
items.notes: Wash thoroughly; watch for recalls (E. coli risk).

items.name: Milk
items.notes: Keep at or below 40°F; discard if sour smell.

items.name: Canned beans
items.notes: If can is bulging or rusted, discard immediately.
